import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../../../LandingPage/Navbar'; import Sidebar from '../../Sidebar/Sidebar'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Marks.css' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Paper, TableContainer, TableBody, Table, TableHead, TableCell, TableRow } from "@material-ui/core" const UploadMarks = () => { const { val } = useSelector((state) => state.toggle); let urlElements = window.location.pathname.split('/'); let user = urlElements[1]; const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (localStorage.getItem("userd") === null || localStorage.getItem("userd") !== user) { navigate('/'); localStorage.clear(); } }, []) const arr=[{}] const handleSubmit = () =>{ console.log(arr); } const handleChange = (x,position) =>{ const updated = value.map((item, index) => index === position ? item=x : '' ); setValue(updated); } const [tableData, setTableData] = useState([{ roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }, { roll: "2000270130065", name: "hargun", email: "hargun2013021@akgec.ac.in" }]); const [value,setValue] = useState(new Array(tableData.length).fill('')) return (<>

Subject:

Physics

Batch:

IT2

Exam:

ST1

Maximum Marks:

100

Roll Number Name Email Marks { tableData.map((data,index) => (<> {data.roll} {data.name} {data.email} { handleChange(e.target.value[index]) }} /> )) }

Upload

); }; export default UploadMarks;
